snippet: Shortening and corn syrup turned out to be tickets to assimilation.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Bich Minh Nguyen,  mourning the news that Hostess cake company is going out of business, describes how junk food like dessert treat Twinkies represented ideal of American indulgence; reflects that losing these snacks means losing connection to country's shared past.
lead_paragraph: Shortening and corn syrup turned out to be tickets to assimilation.
